member.name: D2D1_TURBULENCE_NOISE
member.summary: The turbulence noise mode for the Turbulence effect. Indicates whether to generate a bitmap based on Fractal Noise or the Turbulence function.

member.name: D2D1_TURBULENCE_NOISE.D2D1_TURBULENCE_NOISE_FRACTAL_SUM
member.summary: Computes a sum of the octaves, shifting the output range from [-1, 1], to [0, 1].

member.name: D2D1_TURBULENCE_NOISE.D2D1_TURBULENCE_NOISE_TURBULENCE
member.summary: Computes a sum of the absolute value of each octave.
